    • initRMI

      private void initRMI(int serverPort) throws RemoteException, MalformedURLException
      starts the Registry and the RMI Server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if registry could not start / a server is already running on the same port
      MalformedURLException - if the server could not be started

    • startRegistry

      private void startRegistry(int serverPort) throws RemoteException
      starts the Registry
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a server is already running on the specified port

    • startServer

      private void startServer() throws RemoteException, MalformedURLException
      starts the RMI Server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there was a connection issue
      MalformedURLException - if the name contains illegal characters

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      barCode - needs to provide a valid item id as a String
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the current Items in the checkout
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the barcode is not found as WRONG_BARCODE or if there are no more items for the current barcode as NO_MORE_ITEMS_IN_STOCK

      Returns:
      the total amount for the current checkout
      Throws:

    • cancelCheckout

      public void cancelCheckout()
      A method to be called if the cashier wants to cancel the checkout being currently in progress (e.g. the customer can not pay / the customer doesn't want to buy the items for some reason)
      Specified by:
      cancelCheckout in interface RemoteCheckoutModel

    • cancelCheckout

      public void cancelCheckout(Integer checkoutId)
      A method to be used if the cashier wants to undo an already completed checkout (e.g. customer wants the money back, the checkout was done for testing purposes)
      Specified by:
      cancelCheckout in interface RemoteCheckoutModel
      Parameters:
      checkoutId - the id of the checkout needed to be undone

    • completePayment

      Specified by:
      completePayment in interface RemoteCashierModel
      Parameters:
      paymentType - needs to provide a valid PaymentType argument
